concept.description: Provides node metrics for an aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:FOR_AGGREGATION_LEVEL]-(aggregationLevel:AggregationLevel) OPTIONAL MATCH (nodeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(element) RETURN aggregationLevel as AggregationLevel, count(nodeMetrics) as Metrics, count(element) as AggregatedElements

concept.description: Provided metric keys per aggregation level
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:FOR_AGGREGATION_LEVEL]-(aggregationLevel:AggregationLevel) UNWIND keys(nodeMetrics) AS key RETURN aggregationLevel as AggregationLevel, count(nodeMetrics) as Metrics, collect(DISTINCT key) as Keys
